remarks: Ordered elements commute.  ( ~ lecmi analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 10-Nov-2011.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
lecmt.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
lecmt.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
lecmt.c $e |- C = ( cm ` K ) $.
lecmtN $p |- ( ( K e. OML /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .<_ Y -> X C Y ) ) $.
